name: Antrum
description: Antrum is a procedural generated dungeon where you have to collect as many relics as possible and sell them, but there is a catch, in your path you will encounter creatures that will try to defend those relics but some of them have not seen a human in a long time so they may treat you in an unexpected way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 - compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
